task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions for using the subtraction function of the JPS Calculation App.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what subtraction is.

result.p: The result of the subtraction is displayed.

taskbody.example:
You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will look like this: 3-2. You enter 3. Press minus. Enter 2. Press the equal sign.
The result of 1 will appear on the screen.
